original: DUNKEK, Henry Christian Louis, Fabriksdisponent, Hälsingborg, f Hbg 6/9 70 av hämning J D o Henriette Möller, gm Gerda Sylvan. Anst Hbgs gummifabr.AB 90, disp 94, styr.-ordf sed. 23, vkst dir där o i Trälleb gummifabr.AB, styr.led AB Hbgs gummifabr intressenter, AB Galoscher, AB Tretorn, AB Tretorns intressenter, Gävle Galosch- o skoför-säljn.AB, Örebro d:o, Sv galoschförs.AB, Gbgs d:o, Karlskr d:o, Ryska gummifabr.AB, Ulvsunda d :o, Malmö läderfabr.AB, Malmö sko-fabr.AB, Eslövs d:o, fastigh.AB Hufvudstaden, fastigh.AB Bergaliden, Sv bensin- o petr.AB BP, AB Bensin- o oljekomp, AB Custos, AB Fosfatintressenter, AB Förenade sup fosf.fabr, Reymersholms gamla ind.AB, AB Regia,AB Nils Andersson, Fougstedts klädes- o kon-fekt.AB, Sk jutefabr.AB, Förvaltn.AB HGI, Sjöförs.AB Öresund, AB Ramlösa hälsobrunn, AB Hbgs konserthus, Hbgs sparbk, i centr.styr f Skand kreditAB o i hbgsstyr, ordf Hbgs hdls- o sjöf.nmd, styr.led Sv arb.giv.frn allm grupp. LFS, HedLIVA. DU RIETZ, Dag Erik, Civilingenjör, Äppelviken, f Djursholm 9/11 08 av grhdl B Du R o Ebba Bonthron, gm Rigmor Claughton-Wallin. Studex NReal 27, KTH (skpsbyggn) 33. Svetsing ASEA Sthlm 33—34, självst vksmh 34—37, tekn.ek kons Norrb l 37—40, kon-trolling SAAB 40, chef Stat standardis.komm :s stål- o metallavd sed. 40. Styr.ordf bost.-rättsfrn Alviksgården. Resor: Österr, Frankr 22, Österr 26, Frankr 31, Tyskl, Österr, Ital, Belg 35, Tyskl 42, Av trycket: »Blaswirkung-en bei der Lichbogenschweissung» (Braunschweig 36), »Prakt handbok i bågsvetsn» (Sthlm 37), tysk översättn 39; div tidskr.art i svetsn.faek. Sv Tekn.frn. DU RIETZ. Harald, Civilingenjör, Äppelviken, f Bromma, Sthlms l, 24/6 93 av civ.ing Hj Du R o Lotten Kullman, gm Karin Rim-bert. Studex Sthlm 12, KTH (kemi) 13—16. Ing AB Astra, Apotekarnes Kern Fabr :r, 16— 18, Sthlms Benmjölsfabr AB 18—28, eg ag- o rådgiv verksamh 28—42, T An Tesch AB. Led Sv Tekn.frn. DU RIETZ, Hjalmar, Civilingenjör, Nocke-by, f Sthlm 5/9 64 av grosshandl G A Du R o Louise Borgh, gm (1) Lotten Kullman, (2) Alice Ludin. Nya elem.sk Sthlm 74—81, ord elev KTH 82—84, spec.elev i kem teknol KTH 84—85. Assist v Statens kem station Hlmstd 85—90, fabr.förest v Sthlms Benmjölsfabriks AB:s limfabrik 90—08, vkst dir där 08—39, d :o f Minebergs FagtighAB Sthlm 24—39. Led Bromma kyrko- o skolråd 13 år, rev i Bromma kommun o Br förs fi år, led Inkorp.-nmdn (v Brommas inkorp m Sthlm). Styr.led Sthlms Benmjölsfabriks AB, Minebergs Fas-tighAB, Stidsvigs o Hbgs Limfabr AB samt Bäckebo Ind.AB sed. fi år. Resor: Sverige, Norge, Danm, Finl, Estl, Lettl, Polen, Tyskl, Holl, Belg, Frankr, Engl, Schweiz, Ital, Österr, Tjeckoslov, Ungern o Rumänien uppr ggr. PatrstGM. Hobbies: Botanik, trädgårdsskötsel, fotografi. DU RIETZ, Sven Edvard, Direktör, Stockholm, f Norrköping 25/6 94 av dir C Th Du R o Elin Maria Thyresson, gm Inga-Lisa Falk. Nrkp h a l, aff.stud i USA 16—18. Anst i faderns aff t 16, eg bilfma i Nrkp 19—28, för-säljn.chef i Philipsons Automobil AB Sthlm 29—30, vkst dir i Sthlms Motor AB 31, i AB Bilimporten 35. Dir o ag av AB BMW agenturen. En av stift av Nrkp Automobil Klb, styr.ordf f Sthlms Segelklb 35—38. Inneh inånga pris i biltävl, segling o Skytte. Innehar sv hastighetsrekord f bilkörning å isbana sed. 27. Hobby: Lantbruk.
translated:
DUNKEK, Henry Christian Louis, Factory Manager, Helsingborg, born in Helsingborg on September 6, 1870, son of J D and Henriette Möller, married to Gerda Sylvan. Employment at Helsingborg Rubber Factory AB since 1890, promoted to manager in 1894, served as board chairman since 1923. Also holds positions as director and growth director at Trälleb Rubber Factory AB, member of the board of AB Helsingborg Rubber Factory Investors, AB Galoscher, AB Tretorn, AB Tretorn Investors, Gävle Galosh and Shoe Sales AB, Örebro, Swedish Galosh Sales AB, Gothenburg, Karlskrona, Russian Rubber Factory AB, Ulvsunda, Malmö Leather Factory AB, Malmö Shoe Factory AB, Eslöv, Hufvudstaden Real Estate AB, Bergaliden Real Estate AB, Swedish Gasoline and Petroleum AB BP, AB Gas and Oil Company, AB Custos, AB Phosphate Interests, AB United Sup Phosphate Factory, Reymersholms Old Industrial AB, AB Regia, AB Nils Andersson, Fougstedt Clothing and Dressing AB, Sk Jute Factory AB, HGI Management AB, Öresund Shipping AB, AB Ramlösa Health Spa, AB Helsingborg Concert Hall, Helsingborg Savings Bank, member of the board of Skandia Credit AB and Helsingborg Local Trade and Maritime Board, member of the board of Swedish Employers' Federation from the general group. Member of the LFS and HedLIVA.

DU RIETZ, Dag Erik, Engineer, Äppelviken, born in Djursholm on November 9, 1908, son of B Du R and Ebba Bonthron, married to Rigmor Claughton-Wallin. Graduated from NReal in 1927, studied shipbuilding at KTH from 1927 to 1933. Worked as a welder at ASEA Stockholm from 1933 to 1934, self-employed engineer from 1934 to 1937, technical consultant for Norrbotten County from 1937 to 1940, controller at SAAB from 1940, and head of the steel and metal department at the State Standardization Committee since 1940. Also serves as board chairman for Alviksgården Housing Association. Traveled to Austria and France in 1922, Austria in 1926, France in 1931, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Belgium in 1935, Germany in 1942. Published works include "Blaswirkungen bei der Lichbogenschweissung" (Braunschweig, 1936), "Praktisk handbok i bågsvetsning" (Stockholm, 1937), German translation in 1939. Various articles in welding journals. Member of the Swedish Technical Association.

DU RIETZ, Harald, Engineer, Äppelviken, born in Bromma, Stockholm on June 24, 1893, son of Hj Du R and Lotten Kullman, married to Karin Rimbért. Graduated from Sthlm in 1912, studied chemistry at KTH from 1913 to 1916. Worked as an engineer at AB Astra, Apotekarnes Kern Fabriker from 1916 to 1918, and Sthlms Benmjölsfabriks AB from 1918 to 1928. Engaged in independent business and consulting from 1928 to 1942, and worked at T An Tesch AB. Member of the Swedish Technical Association.

DU RIETZ, Hjalmar, Engineer, Nockeby, born in Stockholm on September 5, 1864, son of wholesale merchant G A Du R and Louise Borgh, married (1) to Lotten Kullman, (2) to Alice Ludin. Attended the new elementary school in Stockholm from 1874 to 1881, regular student at KTH from 1882 to 1884, special student in chemical technology at KTH from 1884 to 1885. Assistant at the State Chemical Station in Halmstad from 1885 to 1890, factory manager at Sthlms Benmjölsfabriks AB's glue factory from 1890 to 1908, director of growth at the same company from 1908 to 1939, also director of Mineberg's Real Estate AB in Stockholm from 1924 to 1939. Member of Bromma Church and School Board for 13 years, auditor in Bromma municipality and Bromma parish for 5 years, member of the Incorporation Committee for Bromma's incorporation into Stockholm. Also serves on the board of Sthlms Benmjölsfabriks AB, Mineberg's Real Estate AB, Stidsvig's and Helsingborg's Glue Factory AB, and Bäckebo Industrial AB for the past 5 years. Traveled to Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Estonia, Latvia, Poland, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, England, Switzerland, Italy, Austria, Czechoslovakia, Hungary, and Romania several times. PatrstGM. Hobbies include botany, gardening, and photography.

DU RIETZ, Sven Edvard, Director, Stockholm, born in Norrköping on June 25, 1894, son of director C Th Du R and Elin Maria Thyresson, married to Inga-Lisa Falk. Completed high school in Norrköping, studied business in the United States from 1916 to 1918. Employed in his father's business in 1916, ran his own car dealership in Norrköping from 1919 to 1928, served as sales manager at Philipsons Automobil AB Stockholm from 1929 to 1930, growth director at Sthlms Motor AB in 1931, and at AB Bilimporten in 1935. Also the director and agent for AB BMW. Founding member of Norrköping Automobile Club, board chairman of Stockholm Sailing Club from 1935 to 1938. Received awards for car racing, sailing, and shooting. Holds the Swedish speed record for driving on ice tracks since 1927. Hobby: Farming.
